p: We selected a representative sample of 32 isolates, including all resistance mechanisms, by choosing up to 3 isolates per farm per resistance genotype for in vitro susceptibility testing using the EUCAST broth microdilution reference assay. The azole phenotypes are consistent with previously reported characteristics, i.e., highly ITR resistant in TR 34 variants and highly voriconazole resistant in TR 46 variants ( Table 2). However, variations in activity of other azoles was observed in isolates harboring the same resistance mutation.
